metadata.title: Validate donor integration via three PCR assays

params.note: Three PCR assays designed to detect left, middle, and right donor DNA integration: PCR1 (5′-TCCTGAGTCCGGACCACTTT / 3′-CACCGCATGTTAGAAGACTTCC), PCR2 (5′-TATGGAGATCCCTCGACCTG / 3′-CCTGGGATACCCCGAAGAGT), PCR3 (5′-TTCTTCTTGATGCTGTGCCG / 3′-GCTCAAGGGGCTTCATGATG)
